translations.You are reaching your mailbox quota limi: You are reaching your mailbox quota limit for {account_email}
translations.You are currently using {percentage} of: You are currently using {percentage} of your mailbox storage. Please make some space by deleting unneeded emails.
translations.Your session has expired. The page will: Your session has expired. The page will be reloaded.
translations.Configuration discovery failed. Please u: Configuration discovery failed. Please use the manual settings
translations.Account created. Please follow the pop-u: Account created. Please follow the pop-up instructions to link your Google account
translations.Account updated. Please follow the pop-u: Account updated. Please follow the pop-up instructions to reconnect your Google account
translations.IMAP username or password is wrong: IMAP username or password is wrong
translations.SMTP username or password is wrong: SMTP username or password is wrong
translations.Configuration discovery temporarily not: Configuration discovery temporarily not available. Please try again later.
translations.There was an error while setting up your: There was an error while setting up your account
translations.Name: Name
translations.Please enter an email of the format name: Please enter an email of the format name@example.com
translations.For the Google account to work with this: For the Google account to work with this app you need to enable two-factor authentication for Google and generate an app password.
translations.A signature is added to the text of new: A signature is added to the text of new messages and replies.
translations.Preferred writing mode for new messages: Preferred writing mode for new messages and replies.
translations.The folders to use for drafts, sent mess: The folders to use for drafts, sent messages, deleted messages, archived messages and junk messages.
translations.Days after which messages in Trash will: Days after which messages in Trash will automatically be deleted:
translations.Automated reply to incoming messages. If: Automated reply to incoming messages. If someone sends you several messages, this automated reply will be sent at most once every 4 days.
translations.Search in the body of messages in priori: Search in the body of messages in priority Inbox
translations.Put my text to the bottom of a reply ins: Put my text to the bottom of a reply instead of on top of it.
translations.Register as application for mail links: Register as application for mail links
translations.Allow the app to collect data about your: Allow the app to collect data about your interactions. Based on this data, the app will adapt to your preferences. The data will only be stored locally.
translations.Looking for a way to encrypt your emails: Looking for a way to encrypt your emails?
translations.Install Mailvelope browser extension by: Install Mailvelope browser extension by clicking here
translations.Encrypt with S/MIME and send later: Encrypt with S/MIME and send later
translations.Encrypt with Mailvelope and send later: Encrypt with Mailvelope and send later
translations.Sign or Encrypt with S/MIME was selected: Sign or Encrypt with S/MIME was selected, but we don't have a certificate for the selected alias. The message will not be signed or encrypted.
translations.Any existing formatting (for example bol: Any existing formatting (for example bold, italic, underline or inline images) will be removed.
translations.Subject: Subject
translations.This message came from a noreply address: This message came from a noreply address so your reply will probably not be read.
translations.The following recipients do not have a S: The following recipients do not have a S/MIME certificate: {recipients}.
translations.The following recipients do not have a P: The following recipients do not have a PGP key: {recipients}.
_The attachment exceed the allowed attac: The attachment exceed the allowed attachments size of {size}. Please share the file via link instead.
The attachments exceed the allowed attachments size of {size}. Please share the files via link instead.
translations.Choose a file to add as attachment: Choose a file to add as attachment
translations.Choose a file to share as a link: Choose a file to share as a link
translations.An error occurred, unable to delete the: An error occurred, unable to delete the tag.
translations.The tag will be deleted from all message: The tag will be deleted from all messages.
translations.Failed to save your participation status: Failed to save your participation status
translations.You already reacted to this invitation: You already reacted to this invitation
translations.You have been invited to an event: You have been invited to an event
translations.Itinerary for {type} is not supported ye: Itinerary for {type} is not supported yet
translations.To archive a message please configure an: To archive a message please configure an archive mailbox in account settings
translations.You are not allowed to move this message: You are not allowed to move this message to the archive folder and/or delete this message from the current folder
translations.Indexing your messages. This can take a: Indexing your messages. This can take a bit longer for larger mailboxes.
translations.Messages will automatically be marked as: Messages will automatically be marked as important based on which messages you interacted with or marked as important. In the beginning you might have to manually change the importance to teach the system, but it will improve over time.
translations.The sender of this message has asked to: The sender of this message has asked to be notified when you read this message.
translations.You sent a read confirmation to the send: You sent a read confirmation to the sender of this message.
translations.Warning: The S/MIME signature of this me: Warning: The S/MIME signature of this message is unverified. The sender might be impersonating someone!
translations.Choose a folder to store the attachment: Choose a folder to store the attachment in
translations.Choose a folder to store the attachments: Choose a folder to store the attachments in
translations.This message is encrypted with PGP. Inst: This message is encrypted with PGP. Install Mailvelope to decrypt it.
translations.The images have been blocked to protect: The images have been blocked to protect your privacy.
translations.The account for {email} and cached email: The account for {email} and cached email data will be removed from Nextcloud, but not from your email provider.
translations.Please login using a password to enable: Please login using a password to enable this account. The current session is using passwordless authentication, e.g. SSO or WebAuthn.
All messages in mailbox will be deleted.
translations.The mailbox and all messages in it will: The mailbox and all messages in it will be deleted.
translations.An error occurred, unable to rename the: An error occurred, unable to rename the mailbox.
translations.Mark all messages of this mailbox as rea: Mark all messages of this mailbox as read
translations.Clear locally cached data, in case there: Clear locally cached data, in case there are issues with synchronization.
translations.No sent mailbox configured. Please pick: No sent mailbox configured. Please pick one in the account settings.
translations.You are trying to send to many recipient: You are trying to send to many recipients in To and/or Cc. Consider using Bcc to hide recipient addresses.
translations.You mentioned an attachment. Did you for: You mentioned an attachment. Did you forget to add it?
translations.The autoresponder follows your personal: The autoresponder follows your personal absence period settings.
translations.${subject} will be replaced with the sub: ${subject} will be replaced with the subject of the message you are responding to
translations.Pending or not sent messages will show u: Pending or not sent messages will show up here
translations.Could not copy email address to clipboar: Could not copy email address to clipboard
translations.The syntax seems to be incorrect:: The syntax seems to be incorrect:
translations.Your signature is larger than 2 MB. This: Your signature is larger than 2 MB. This may affect the performance of your editor.
translations.An error occurred, unable to rename the: An error occurred, unable to rename the tag.
translations.Tag name is a hidden system tag: Tag name is a hidden system tag
translations.An error occurred, unable to create the: An error occurred, unable to create the tag.
translations.This message was encrypted by the sender: This message was encrypted by the sender before it was sent.
translations.Error when deleting and deprovisioning a: Error when deleting and deprovisioning accounts for "{domain}"
translations.Using the wildcard (*) in the provisioni: Using the wildcard (*) in the provisioning domain field will create a configuration that applies to all users, provided they do not match another configuration.
translations.There can only be one configuration per: There can only be one configuration per domain and only one wildcard domain configuration.
There is already a message in progress. All unsaved changes will be lost if you continue!
translations.Attachments were not copied. Please add: Attachments were not copied. Please add them manually.
translations.Could not load the desired message: Could not load the desired message
translations.Click here if you are not automatically: Click here if you are not automatically redirected within the next few seconds.
translations.If you do not want to visit that page, y: If you do not want to visit that page, you can return to Mail.
